item.content:encoded:
Guiding Light Mother’s Day Photo Flat Card

Review Guiding Light Mother’s Day Photo Flat Card – greeting cards Popular Guiding Light Mother’s Day Photo Flat Card It’s a great choice Guiding Light Mother’s Day Photo Flat Card You can order itThis Mother’s Day card is a beautiful and heartfelt tribute to the guiding force in your life. The front of the card features the quote "Thank you for being the guiding light that has always led me home" in elegant writing surrounded by delicate white floral sketches. The personalized photo of your choice sits at the center of the card. The quote itself is a powerful reminder of the love and guidance that your mother has provided throughout your life. She has been a beacon of light, a steady presence, and a source of comfort and reassurance. The delicate floral sketches on the card suggest the beauty and tenderness of your mother’s nurturing spirit, which has helped you grow and flourish.

The back of the card offers an optional additional photo and greeting, giving you the opportunity to share more memories and express your gratitude in your own words. Whether you choose to add another photo or a heartfelt message, the card will be a cherished keepsake that your mother will treasure for years to come. Price:$2.00

Guiding Light Mother’s Day Photo Flat Card

Category : greeting cards
